BreadcrumbDescription: Separated from Horadrim by violent earthquake that collapsed inner gate in Caldeum, I have to find a way to reach my allies.
BreadcrumbHeader: Find a way into the Palace
Callback51Header: Find the way into the Imperial Palace
Callback66Header: Find the way into the Imperial Palace
Name: The Walls Shake
Phase22Description: I've learned the source of ground tremors in Caldeum is Duriel, Lord of Pain, who was released by Lilith when she opened Gates to Hell and collapsed this part of the city. Now he stands between me and my goal.
Phase24Description: Ground tremors in Caldeum separated me from my allies and now I must find an alternative route to the palace.
Phase24OutsideSubzoneHeader: Find a way into the Imperial Palace
Phase61Description: Ground tremors in Caldeum separated me from my allies and now I must find an alternative route to the palace.
Phase61OutsideSubzoneHeader: Find a way into the Imperial Palace
